trans-unit.source: Identifies the point properties of a visual style element.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PointProperty> enumeration represents a set of point properties that describe visual style elements.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PointProperty> values are used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetPoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to specify which property value to retrieve for the element that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> currently represents.
The smallest bounds that the image specified by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile"></xref> value was designed for.
The smallest bounds that the image specified by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile1"></xref> value was designed for.
The smallest bounds that the image specified by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile2"></xref> value was designed for.
The smallest bounds that the image specified by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile3"></xref> value was designed for.
The smallest bounds that the image specified by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile4"></xref> value was designed for.
The smallest bounds that the image specified by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile5"></xref> value was designed for.
The offset for window element layouts.
The location of character shadows, relative to origin characters.
